Summary: "Batman's not coming to save you, Jason. You're my sidekick now!" There's vomit at the back of your throat. You've heard the stories. entry.title: Who The Hell Are You?
entry.summary:
Author: Ava_Mae

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,287Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 39

Summary: There was an unexpected knock on the fire escape door, and then it slid open before you could even begin to think of a response. "Hey Jaybird, what're you doing in this place? Is this one of your new safehouses or wha--" A unfamiliar man wearing a red sleeveless suit, a red domino mask, and a trucker cap, with a bow and quiver slung across his back, froze in the middle of the living room, just staring at you. "Who are you?" he demanded. Your jaw dropped. "Who am I? You're the one who just waltzed into my apartment like you own it!" you shot back loudly. "Who the hell do you think you are?"  Next to you, Jay pinched the bridge of his nose. "....aw shit."

entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 99,444Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 133

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms.That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally.You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony… until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city.Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.title: Cracks in the Armor
entry.summary:
Author: arkham_bunniii

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,987Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 194

Summary: You were a former GCPD detective who left the force after Gotham’s corruption pushed you too far. Now, you work in the gray area of Gotham’s underworld—tracking weapons, gathering intel, and occasionally taking down the scum that even the Bat can’t reach.When the Arkham Knight arrives, he doesn’t just tear through Gotham… he takes it over in a single night. Every time you cross paths, it’s the same: a dangerous game of cat and mouse.You’re enemies. You should be enemies. But every fight, every standoff, pulls you closer, and something tells you there’s more to this soldier than the armor he wears.All your begging to ask is, what’s really beneath that helmet?
